compatibility.notes: BSD-2-Clause-FreeBSD is compatible with most permissive licenses and some open-source licenses, but may have compatibility issues with copyleft licenses.

key_requirements: Include the copyright notice, list of conditions, and disclaimer in all redistributions (source and binary).
Comply with the liability and warranty disclaimers.
license.name: BSD-2-Clause-FreeBSD
obligations: Retain the above copyright notice and this list of conditions in the documentation and/or other materials provided with the distribution.
Reproduce the above copyright notice, this list of conditions and the disclaimer in the documentation and/or other materials provided with the binary distribution.
